node.title: 'This birth is so important to us': Dubbo zoo welcomes new baby rhino
node.alt: A light grey baby rhino stands in front of it's mother, which looks directly at the camera.
node.description: Taronga Western Plains Zoo announces the birth of a male greater one-horned rhino calf named Hari, which means sun in Nepalese.
node.content:
["Taronga Western Plains Zoo has announced the birth of a male greater one-horned rhino calf.", "Hari, which means sun in Nepalese, is the second calf of its species to be born in Australia.\u00a0", "Taronga Western Plains is the only zoo in Australia that holds this type of rhino.\u00a0", "Hari's arrival follows the birth of Sabi Star, a female black rhino calf, at the zoo earlier this year.", "The greater one-horned rhino is usually found in North-Eastern India and is regarded as a vulnerable species, with around 3,700 in the wild.", "\"That's why this birth is so important to us,\" zookeeper Kat Pollock said.", "The species will only give birth to one calf every four years, and each pregnancy lasts about 15 to 16 months.", "", "
\u00a0Amala\u00a0gave birth to Hari in the early hours of the morning after being pregnant for\u00a0475 days.(Supplied: Taronga Western Plains Zoo)
", "
Growing fast
", "At four weeks old, Hari is already in excess of 100 kilograms.", "Ms Pollock said he was\u00a0putting on around one to two kilos each day.", "\"He's probably drinking around 20\u201330 litres of milk or suckling from his mum, so that's where that weight comes from,\" she said.", "", "
Hari already weighs more than 100kg at four weeks old.(Supplied: Taronga Western Plains Zoo)
", "Hari's keepers said he was quite advanced for his age as he was already trying to eat grass and bits of his mum's\u00a0favourite branches.\u00a0", "\"He thinks he's a big boy already and can handle the solids,\" Ms Pollock said.", "The greater one-horned rhino is the largest of the species with adults weighing more than 2,000kg.", "
Keeping the trust
", "Ms Pollock said it had\u00a0been a long journey over the past 10 years to build a strong trust between the keepers and Hari's mother, Amala.", "\"We don't want to do anything to break those bonds with us,\" she said.", "She also said keepers were trying not to \"come between him and his mum right now\" because of how\u00a0protective she was of\u00a0him.", "", "
Zookeepers say keeping the trust with\u00a0Amala is important in looking after\u00a0Hari.(Supplied: Taronga Western Plains Zoo)
", "She said maintaining that strong positive relationship with Amala was important for when the keepers might need to handle Hari\u00a0for medical reasons, like his tetanus injection in six months' time.\u00a0", "\"We're getting him used to being handled, and it's something that we do in very small baby steps,\" Ms Pollock said.", "\"So we'll be touching him in the areas where the injection will go, we'll get her [Amala]\u00a0used to allowing us to be around when that's happening.\""]
